desc: Engineered for athletes, great for everyone. QlipFit fasteners are quicker, easier and safer. They combine with standard or elastic laces to provide slip-on convenience.. Qlip on and off in a second. A perfect fit every time. No loose laces. No tying and untying. The difference between winning and second place,

layout.text:
The Quicker, Safer, &
Easier way to tie
your shoes.
